name: Comp AI
tagline: The open source Vanta & Drata alternative
description: The Open Source Drata & Vanta alternative that does everything you need to get compliant with frameworks like SOC 2, ISO 27001 & GDPR - in weeks, not months.

name: Midjourney v7
tagline: The smartest, most beautiful, most coherent model
description: V7 has personalization turned on by default, raising the bar for how well we can interpret what you want and what you find beautiful. V7 introduces Draft Mode, half the cost and 10x the speed. It's the best way to iterate on ideas ever.

name: Experiments
tagline: Try new habits, challenges, and tools
description: Experiments help you track your life experiments, letting you check in on your progress and log observations through notes or photos. At the end of your chosen duration, you can review and reflect on whether you want to continue with it.

name: Shamaze
tagline: The app that tells a story in your own voice
description: Bring the magic of your voice to bedtime stories. Use Shamaze to create personalized bedtime stories in your own voice - even when you can‚Äôt be there. Shamaze is part of Eleven Labs Grants Accelerator.

name: & Breathe
tagline: A mindful extension helping you take a breath on a new tab
description: An extension that gives you the option to stop and breathe on each new tab. It lets you pick from different breathing techniques, set the duration of your mindful breathing, and choose different color themes.

name: NotebookLM Discover Sources
tagline: Describe your topic, get curated web sources
description: NotebookLM has launched Discover Sources, which lets you add sources from the web to your notebook. Import with one click to build your notebook faster. Free for all users.

name: Super Grok
tagline: Voice, custom prompts, languages and more
description: Power your Grok experience with custom prompts, voice input, multiple languages, and advanced chat modes for smarter conversations.

name: CineMapper
tagline: Filmed there, go there! 'Google Maps for film'
description: The Google Maps of Movies! Explore real-world filming locations from your favorite films & TV shows. üåç‚ú® Browse an interactive map, discover scene details, plan film tours, and step into cinematic history. Ready to explore? üöÄ #FilmTourism

name: Koah
tagline: Make money with ads in your AI chat app
description: Monetize your GenAI app with contextual ads. Our JavaScript snippet and React Native SDK make setup fast‚Äîjust 5 minutes.

name: Potatoe Squeezy
tagline: Support github contributors with crypto
description: Support your favorite GitHub contributors with crypto! ü•î‚ú® Show love to open-source developers through fast, secure, and hassle-free crypto tipping. üöÄüíñ

name: ScrapeLoop
tagline: Turn any website into a data source in minutes
description: ScrapeLoop is the ultimate website change detection and monitoring tool. Stay informed about changes that matter to you!

name: Proton Drive 2.0
tagline: Free secure cloud storage | proton
description: End-to-end encrypted file storage from Switzerland that lets you securely back up your files on the cloud, access them anywhere, and share them with anyone.

name: Jammy Chat
tagline: Music recommendations based on your mood
description: Jammy senses your mood and recommends socially-proven content to help you process what you‚Äôre feeling right now ‚Äînot what you clicked on yesterday.

name: NoteUX Chrome Extension
tagline: Capture notes on every new Tab
description: Meet NoteUX.com which is a beautifully designed note-taking app that helps you quickly capture, organize, and optimize your thoughts effortlessly. It's a persistent notepad on a new Tab with 7 scratch pads ready to be scratched!

name: yaps[dot]chat redesigned
tagline: One-time end-to-end encrypted anonymous chats
description: yaps[dot]chat is a new kind of messenger. You can easily chat, send files and images to anyone without middle man. all the messages and shared information end-to-end encrypted and never stored on the server.

name: DreamActor-M1 From ByteDance
tagline: Holistic & expressive human animation with custom controls
description: DreamActor-M1: Holistic, Expressive and Robust Human Image Animation with Hybrid Guidance.

name: Zone Share
tagline: Mirror part of your screen to a window for precise control
description: Struggling to share your ultra-wide screen in video calls? Share Zone lets you mirror a part of the screen to a separate window for precise control. ‚úÖ Custom screen area selection ‚úÖ Predefined aspect ratios ‚úÖ Adjustable size & position ‚úÖ Global hotkeys

name: Notion Progress Bar Formula Generator
tagline: Create colorful & aesthetic Notion progress bars in 1-click
description: Does your Notion setup look plain and boring? üò¥ Generate custom progress bar formulas with emojis, colors, or cool symbols. Preview your bar, copy the formula, and paste it into your Notion database‚Äîeasy and instant! üöÄ

name: Blark
tagline: PRO black & white camera app for iPhone.
description: Beautifully designed, easy-to-use, monochrome/black & white camera app for iPhone

name: iMessage Sync by Dex
tagline: Personal CRM that automatically tracks chat interactions
description: Dex‚Äôs latest integration makes it the only personal CRM that auto-tracks LinkedIn, WhatsApp, and iMessage interactions ‚Äî no more manual work. Dex is used by tens of thousands of people whose networking is key to their success, from jobseekers to executives.
